LanguageData.Arrow_EMBowsling.label: bowsling arrow
LanguageData.Bullet_EMEye.label: evil gaze
LanguageData.Bullet_EMJavelin.label: bomb javelin
LanguageData.Bullet_EMRipper.label: ripper cloud
LanguageData.Bullet_EMShotstaff.label: shotstaff thorn
LanguageData.EM_ChemicalCharge.label: Chemical Charges
LanguageData.EM_ChemicalCharge.description: A volatile mixture of chemicals and mechanites from a lost recipe, explodes in a concussive blast when thrown.
LanguageData.EM_GunBowsling.label: Bowsling
LanguageData.EM_GunBowsling.description: Lost technology brought to life with mechanites. A bundle of arrows dropped into this rather unwieldy tube are spat out at incredible speeds with surprising accuracy.
LanguageData.EM_GunBowsling.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Bowsling
LanguageData.EM_GunJavelin.label: Bomb Javelin
LanguageData.EM_GunJavelin.description: Ancient pattern explosives powered by mechanites tip these oddly weighted javelins. Tough to throw very far but explode with intense heat and concussive force. Extremely dangerous when used in enclosed spaces.
LanguageData.EM_GunJavelin.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Bomb Javelin
LanguageData.EM_GunRipper.label: Ripper
LanguageData.EM_GunRipper.description: A very strange piece of ancient technology. Releases a cloud of mechanites that tear and shred anything they touch to pieces.
LanguageData.EM_GunRipper.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.EM_GunRipper.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.EM_GunRipper.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Ripper
LanguageData.EM_GunShotstaff.label: Thunder Staff
LanguageData.EM_GunShotstaff.description: Bizarre combination of recovered technology and weaponsmithing. Unleashes dozens of tiny bards in a wide arc. Short range, great for groups. Also makes for a decent melee weapon due to the barbs that cover it. Takes a long time to shoot and move after shooting.
LanguageData.EM_GunShotstaff.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.EM_GunShotstaff.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.EM_GunShotstaff.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Thunder Staff
LanguageData.Gun_EMEvilEye.label: Evil Eye
LanguageData.Gun_EMEvilEye.description: Perculiar piece of ancient technology. By merely looking through the eyepiece at something and manipulating the mechanism damage appears as if by magic. Surely an evil artifact from time long gone.
LanguageData.Gun_EMEvilEye.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Evil Eye
LanguageData.Proj_EMCharge.label: chemical mixture
